title: Joy of the desolate, light of the straying,

author.name: Lewis E. Jones
author.bio: Lewis Edgar Jones was an American hymn writer and a secretary for the YMCA.

lyrics:
Joy of the desolate, light of the straying,
hope of the penitent, fadeless and pure!
Here speaks the Comforter, in mercy saying,
"Earth has no sorrows that heaven cannot
cure."
